Trigger.name: Swarm

regexCodeList.string: ^(You) utter a loud, buzzing call, and a swarm of wasps rushes in but they do little more than annoy (.+)\.$
^(\w+) utters a loud, buzzing call and a swarm of wasps rushes in but they do little more than annoy (.+)\.$
^(\w+) utters a loud, buzzing call and a swarm of wasps rushes in, swarming over (.+)'s slowed form and stinging \w+ flesh\.$
^(You) utter a loud, buzzing call and a swarm of wasps rushes in, swarming over (.+)'s slowed form and stinging \w+ flesh\.$
^(\w+) utters a loud, buzzing call and a swarm of wasps rushes in, swarming over (.+)'s form and stinging \w+slow\-healing flesh\.$
^(You) utter a loud, buzzing call and a swarm of wasps rushes in, swarming over (.+)'s form and stinging \w+ slow\-healing flesh\.$
